metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37519 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in authfile.c memcached 1.6.9 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted authenticattion file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.6.14-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a minor issue, an attacker would have to be able to create an auth file, and even so, it will result only in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: memcached package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.14-1').
